thread.title: Kaley Cuoco shrugs off gossipy rumors of 'Big Bang' affair
thread.title_full: Kaley Cuoco shrugs off gossipy rumors of 'Big Bang' affair | Examiner.com

author: Heather Tooley
title: Kaley Cuoco shrugs off gossipy rumors of 'Big Bang' affair
text:
Kaley Cuoco denies 'Big Bang' affair. Instagram Kaley Cuoco is shrugging off gossipy rumors that she had a "Big Bang" affair with one of her co-stars. The 29-year-old actress recently split from her husband of two years and is now finding herself in the center of rumors that she had a secret affair with Johnny Galecki, who portrays her husband on "Big Bang Theory."
Cuoco broke it off with tennis player, Ryan Sweeting, in September. It's believed that she's rekindling her relationship with Galecki, 40, News Oxy reports on October 16. According to EOnline , Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki were together for two years until December 2009. Both of them are writing posts on Instagram that they never dated in real life despite what their scripted relationship is on the show.
According to a post by Cuoco, Quote: : "So sorry to disappoint, but no home wreckers or secret flings going on here. Me and @sanctionedjohnnygalecki are just the best of buds – Leonard and Penny will just have to suffice!!!" Galecki posted his own message, writing: "No scandals/home wreckers/pregnancies here, y’all. Just profound friendship."
Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki deny they ever had a romantic relationship outside of work. Do you believe them?
